question.text: Soaps do not work in hard water containing calcium and magnesium ions because

options.text: <math><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>  and  <math><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>  ions form insoluble calcium and magnesium salts in the form of scum

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>  and  <math><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>  present in soap react with  <math><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>  and  <math><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>  and hinder cleansing process

a large amount of soap is to be used in presence of  <math><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>  and  <math><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>

scum formed by combination of  <math><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math> ,  <math><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>  and  <math><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>  stick to the cloth and are not removed on agitation

solution.text:
Ca2+ and Mg2+ ions form insoluble calcium and magnesium soaps respectively when sodium or potassium soaps are dissolved in hard water.

2C17H35COONasoap+CaCl2→2NaCl+(C17H35COO)2CaInsoluble calciumstearate soap

These insoluble soaps separate as scum in water and are useless as cleansing agent.
